title: ALS Ice Bucket Challenge - Go Style
description:
If you have not heard about the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge I would be surprised. It’s everywhere nowadays, being done by celebrities alike. After being challenged by my children there was only one person, or should I say Gopher, I knew I needed to nominate. The Gopher took to the challenge and here it is:
I would like to thank my daughter for spending time today filming and editing the video.
